column5: So this morning starts off with my wife getting me up just before 7:00 AM and says let's get going.  I go for my morning smoke and come back in the house and tell her "no, the weather sucks and I'm not ready".  So she books off for a 15KM run thinking by time she gets back the weather will be better.  Sure enough it's snowing...  So she send me into town to pick stuff up for the day that we missed so we can get going. It's now 9:00 AM and my kid's are going nuts asking to get going because they have things to do later ( at 6 and 3 what plans do they have   ) So needless to say I got both kids room painted just in time to post this crappie report...
Ah... you bored too Geoff Good on you for getting the kids room painted Leechman
Yes I am Jacques...  LOL! All I can say I man I'm sore...
i sure hope that no one mistakes you for a speckled trout next time your out fishing !!!!
LmAo!  Well I did paint one room two different pink's and the other two blue's...  Who know's...
Update: I'm done!  Thank GWAD as I didn't finish till dinner time.  NOTE TO SELF - next home better not hsve those odd walls for looks and so forth...
